pages.text: $(li)Warped Toads are neutral large blue amphibians that attacks with their tongues and they can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/warped_forest)Warped Forests$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li) Warped Toads target $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/fly)Flies$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito)Crimson Mosquitos$(/l) as their prey.$(br)$(li) They move via hopping and they can also swim in lava and water.

$(li)Warped Toads can be tamed with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larvas$(/l).$(br)$(li)Once tamed, you can command a Warped Toad to sit, follow or wander. These creatures will defend their owner from another creatures.$(br)$(li)Tamed Warped Toads can be bred giving to them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crimson_mosquito_larva)Crimson Mosquito Larvas$(/l).$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/shroomlight)Shroomlight$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nether_wart)Nether Wart$(/l) upon death.
